Article.ArticleTitle: Roles of Plant-Associated Microbiota in Traditional Herbal Medicine.

AbstractText: The microbiome of medicinal plants may directly impact the metabolome of the host, and thus could influence the efficacy of herbal medicine. We advocate a herb for traditional Chinese medicine (TCM), Salvia miltiorrhiza, as a prime model system to study how microbes may interact with medicinal plants to modify phytochemical production.
